medical_history.chief_complaint: Right lower quadrant pain, nausea, fevers, chills.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient felt unwell for 5 days. Nausea, fevers, and chills began at that time. Vomiting started 3 days ago and has resolved. Pain in the right lower quadrant started 2 days ago, described as dull, cramping, and non-radiating, worsening over time. Patient has had loose bowel movements but no diarrhea, and additionally reports a severe headache. Last meal was at 9 AM on the day of assessment.
